Sale!

High Five MT Snow 2013/14

$499.75 $399.80

Purchase a 5 pack to your favorite destination… For a limited time purchase 4 day trip packages to your favorite mountain destination (bus and lift ticket package option) and get your fifth trip FREE!!!


By purchasing this product, you will get following coupon(s):

  • Store Credit of $499.75

Categories: Gift Certificate, High 5 (Trip 5 Packs), MT Snow. Tags: coupon, day trip, Discount, High Five, Mount Snow, Vermont, VT.
  • Description
  • Reviews (0)

Product Description

5 Day Trips for the Price of 4!

Limited Availability… Get’em While They’re HOT!!

Now you can buy a five pack of day trips to your favorite mountain. Make booking your favorite trip faster and easier than EVER!

Once you purchase your High Five Package, you’ll be emailed a unique coupon code. When you want to use your High Five, just reserve your trip as you normally would. Before the final check out, apply your coupon and your trip will be deducted from your High Five. If you are signed into your account, your coupon will appear in your shopping cart automatically and all you have to do is click on the box to apply it to your purchase, finalize and done! The value of your applicable purchase will apply to your total purchase, and will automatically keep track of your balance.

Because we’re so stoked to High Five you, we’re running a limited time promotion.

For a limited time you can purchase the High Five at a promotional discount. You’ll get 5 day trip packages to your favorite mountain destination for the cost of only 4!!! Available now through 12/31/2013 purchase a High Five pack and appreciate the ease of booking along with the added value of a free trip. Make your commitment to that mountain now before the season begins, or give someone a High Five as a gift…

Take advantage of the early season package special! Remember the special pricing is only available for a limited time!

*High Five credits are used as “store credit”, good only for the specific destination purchased. No blackout dates, you can use your credits on any date. Packages can be purchased as a gift.
*Discounted package available for purchase until 12/31/2013. All High Fives can only be used for the current 2013/14 season, which will officially end 5/1/2014, but may end sooner due to tentative closing days of the individual mountains. Create an account and you can easily apply your store credit to your eligible purchase.
*Non transferable; credits can not be applied to any other purchase or customer.
*Prices for program based on non-holiday all area lift bus and bus packages. These credits can be used on holidays or for other packages, but may leave a nominal difference to be paid.

About OvRride

OvRride is a collective of snowboarders from around the world who have come together in New York City to create the first and only rider owned and operated tour company in the Metro area.

Lead by New York’s most experienced Snowboard industry veterans, the OvRride team helps riders and skiers escape from the concrete canyons of NYC to the pristine peaks of America’s North East and beyond. Our goal in mind; to OvRride the Everyday!

Whether its running daily luxury bus trips to the best mountain resorts in the North East or leading our travelers on international riding adventures, there is one thing that never changes; our dedication to our customer’s experience!
